OPTIONAL_PARAMETER_MISSING.error_description: At least one optional parameter should be required in the body.

INVALID_CLIENT_ID.error_description: Client identifier is missing or invalid: {0}.

TEMP_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE.error_description: The {0} server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

INVALID_NEW_PASSWORD.error_description: The new password doesn't meet password required format or strength.

TEMP_PASSWORD_NOT_FOUND.error_description: The temp password is not found by user identifier {0}.

PREVIOUS_NEW_PASSWORD.error_description: New and old passwords must not match.

MATCH_PASSWORD_HISTORY.error_description: New password has been previously used and cannot be reused.

INVALID_ANSWER.error_description: At least one answer is not correct

INVALID_UNAME_FORMAT.error_description: The UNAME format is not valid.

USER_ID_NOT_FOUND.error_description: api context and iam session and user id not exist.
